member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.Equals
member.summary: The left and right terms are equal to one another.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.NotEquals
member.summary: The left and right terms are not equal to one another.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.GreaterThan
member.summary: The left term is greater than the right term.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.GreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The left term is greater than or equal to the right term.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.LessThan
member.summary: The left term is less than the right term.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.LessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The left term is less than or equal to the right term.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.IsNotNull
member.summary: The left term is not null.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.Contains
member.summary: The left term is contained within the right term (list).

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.ContainsNot
member.summary: The left term is not contained within the right term (list).

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.StartsWith
member.summary: The left term starts with the right term.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchCondition.EndsWith
member.summary: The left term ends with the right term.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchFilter.Field
member.summary: The field upon which to match.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchFilter.Condition
member.summary: The condition by which the parsed document's content is evaluated against the supplied value.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchFilter.Value
member.summary: The value to be evaluated using the specified condition against the parsed document's content. When using GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqualTo, LessThan, or LessThanOrEqualTo, the value supplied must be convertible to decimal.

member.name: T:Komodo.Classes.SearchQuery
member.summary: Object used to search an index.

member.summary: The GUID of the search operation.

member.summary: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchQuery.StartIndex
member.summary: The starting index position for the search.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchQuery.Required
member.summary: Required terms and search filter that must be satisfied to include a document in the results.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchQuery.Optional
member.summary: Optional terms and search filter that may match on documents but are not required.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchQuery.Exclude
member.summary: Terms and search filter that must be excluded from the results.

member.summary: Object returned as the result of a search against an index.

member.summary: Indicates if the statistics operation was successful.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.IndexName
member.summary: The name of the index that was queried.

member.name: T:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents
member.summary: Amount of time spent in various aspects of search. Time elements may not add up to the 'Overall' time as not every element is measured.

member.name: F:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.Overall
member.summary: Overall time spent processing the search query.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.PreparationMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, preparing internal data structures for the search.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.RequiredExcludedTermsMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, evaluating required and excluded terms.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.ReadParseResultsMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, reading parse results from documents.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.OptionalTermsMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, evaluating optional terms.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.RequiredExcludedFiltersMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, evaluating required and excluded filters.

member.name: P:Komodo.Classes.SearchResult.SearchResultTimeComponents.OptionalFiltersMs
member.summary: Time spent, in milliseconds, evaluating optional filters.
